Problems in school?
Value: Got into numerous fights, started out as a loner then proceeded to used intimidation to get respect. Lying, stealing, reckless driving. Tormented the weak. “Dull” personality.

Heading: Mother’s occupation
Value: House-wife. Controlled the family. Opened Rosebud Laundromat.

Value: Average. Didn’t stand out as a student.
